WPA Index to Deaths in Hendricks County, Indiana (1882-1920)

Transcription Â© Meredith Thompson

Notes:

This index was compiled in 1939 by the Works Progress Administration (WPA). It covers deaths that occurred from 1882 (the year Indiana first began registering deaths) up through 1920.

For copies of the actual death records, you should contact the Hendricks County Health Department.
